thread.title: Mauricio Pochettino slams Spurs and claims his side did 'not look ready to win Premier League'
thread.title_full: Mauricio Pochettino slams Spurs and claims his side did 'not look ready to win Premier League'

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Mauricio Pochettino slams Spurs and claims his side did 'not look ready to win Premier League'
text:
Mauricio Pochettino slams Spurs display and says 'they are NOT ready to fight for the Premier League' Liverpool had the game won inside 20 minutes through a terrific Sadio Mane brace Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Spurs boss slams his side's display Share this video Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
A furious Mauricio Pochettino has slammed his Spurs players following their 2-0 defeat to Liverpool on Saturday. 
The Argentine let rip in his post-match interview with BT Sport and even claimed his side did not look like a team capable of fighting for the Premier League . 
Liverpool battered their visitors all over the pitch and could have easily been three or four nil up at half-time. 
Sadio Mane scored two in two minutes just after quarter of an hour, and nearly had a third only moments later. Pochettino was seething on the touchline (Photo: Clive Brunskill/Getty Images) 
Spurs did up their game in the second half but failed to make an impact of any kind. 
Speaking to BT Sport after the game, Pochettino said: "We are in a position where it is up to us. But if you show, like we did today, that you can't cope with the pressure to try and win the league... Sadio Mane ran Spurs ragged (Photo: PA) 
"We have to be focused and try to win games and then we'll see what happens. 
"It's true that it's difficult to challenge and try to fight for the Premier League, but today, in the first 45 minutes, that is not a team that are ready to fight for the Premier League." 
BT Sport is your home of unmissable live football from the Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League and FA Cup. Visit btsport.com for more info. Like us on Facebook
